title: Apache
description: Apache is a widely used open-source web server software known for its flexibility, scalability and robust performance in serving static and dynamic content.
content: The open-source web server that is popular for its ability to serve static and dynamic content. It supports a variety of programming languages and modules for customization. It can handle multiple requests using a multi-threaded approach with the worker or event MPM or a multi-process, single-threaded model with the prefork MPM.
